cast.name: 吉杜·克里希那穆提 Jiddu Krishnamurti

this_title: Infinite Potential: The Life and Ideas of David Bohm
trans_title: 无限的潜能：大卫波姆的人生和想法
introduction: INFINITE POTENTIAL takes us on a mystical and scientific journey into the nature of life and reality with David Bohm, the man Einstein called his "spiritual son" and the Dalai Lama his "science guru." A physicist and explorer of Consciousness, Bohm turned to Eastern wisdom to develop groundbreaking insights into the profound interconnectedness of the Universe and our place within it.
chinese_title: 无限的潜能：大卫波姆的人生和想法
foreign_title: Infinite Potential: The Life and Ideas of David Bohm
